headlines.description: Gylfi Sigurdsson deepened Cardiff City's Premier League relegation fears with two well-taken goals in Everton's 3-0 victory in the Welsh capital.

tracking.trackingName: INET_SOC Highlights (Cardiff 0-3 Everton: Sigurdsson stars) 20190226 US ONLY

headlines.shortLinkText: Sigurdsson double helps Everton sink Cardiff

headlines.description: Bottom club Huddersfield Town earned their third Premier League win of the season as a stoppage-time goal from Steve Mounie gave them a 1-0 win.

video.headline: Huddersfield Town 1-0 Wolves: Siewert gets his 1st win

tracking.trackingName: INET_SOC Highlights (Huddersfield Town 1-0 Wolves: Siewert gets his 1st win) 20190226 US ONLY

headlines.shortLinkText: Mounie goal gives Huddersfield win over Wolves

events.name: Brighton & Hove Albion at Leicester City

headlines.description: Newly-appointed Leicester manager Brendan Rodgers watched from the stands as the Foxes returned to form with a 2-1 defeat of Brighton.

video.headline: Leicester 2-1 Brighton: Rodgers delight with Foxes win

tracking.trackingName: INET_SOC HIGHLIGHT (Leicester 2-1 Brighton: Rodgers delight with Foxes win) 2019/2/26 US ONLY

headlines.shortLinkText: Leicester beat Brighton as Rodgers watches on

headlines.description: A stunning strike from Fabian Schar and youngster Sean Longstaff's first goal for the club gave Newcastle United a comfortable 2-0 win over Burnley

tracking.trackingName: INET_SOC HIGHLIGHT (Newcastle 2-0 Burnley: Magpies leapfrog Clarets) 2019/2/26 US ONLY

headlines.shortLinkText: Newcastle end Burnley's unbeaten run, move up
